properties.name: Samambaia

description.value:
Excellent pastry shop with homemade specialties, featuring the traditional Florentine rice pudding, plus vegan and gluten-free croissants. Open daily from 6:30 AM. Continental breakfast served from 9:00 AM. Just around the corner, 2 minutes' walk.: Breakfast, brunch and lunch featuring dishes from around the world. 4 minutes' walk. Mon-Fri 8:00 AM-4:00 PM, Sat 9:00 AM-4:00 PM, Sun 10:00 AM-4:00 PM
